me too, although I can't vote. But I completely agree with Badnarik's take on education. I am going through public schools and major change is needed. We aren't learning anymore, we're trying to pass tests. The point of school has become to pass tests and not actually learn. People memorize stuff, take the test, then in the next month forget it. We need to focus more on learning. We also should have a more flexible plan. Not everyone learns at the same rate. We need to make it so people have a love of learning and so that people can explore different topics. Everyone should learn the basics but then the teacher could help small groups who didn't understand something or they could help the students who understood it advance to the next level and encourage them to explore things they're interested in. Some things I disagree with him on, but out of him Kerry and Bush, I would vote him if I could vote (I can in 4 more years)
